title: 3 and Out - Burrow's "It", Unhappy Urban, Defending Aaron, Gruden's Grinders, NFL Week 4 Preview, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Burrow's "It", Unhappy Urban, Defending Aaron, Gruden's Grinders, NFL Week 4 Preview, 3 for the $$$, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to Joe Burrow's "it" factor in the Bengals TNF win over Trevor Lawrence and the rebuilding Jags, and why Urban Meyer is in over his head in the pros. He also defends Aaron Rodgers against critics accusing him of being a bad teammate, looks at the Raiders role players changing the culture for Jon Gruden, and gives his takes on underwhelming former 5-star Spencer Rattler taking heat from Oklahoma fans. He also gives his quick takes on Week 4 NFL matchups, runs his 3 for the Money NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
